name: Mohamed Ali's Workout
description: A 6-day Push-Pull-Leg split program designed to hit most muscles through varied movements using barbells, dumbbells, and machines.

goals.primary: To build strength and muscle mass through a structured 6-day Push-Pull-Leg routine with varied movements.
goals.safety: Focus on proper form with all exercises. Warm up thoroughly before lifting heavy weights. Stop immediately if you feel any sharp pain.

warmupOptions.name: Treadmill
warmupOptions.description: Light jog or brisk walk to elevate heart rate

warmupOptions.name: Stationary Bike
warmupOptions.description: Moderate pace cycling to warm up legs

warmupOptions.name: Rowing Machine
warmupOptions.description: Steady rowing to engage full body

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: Complex movement. Keep shoulder blades retracted and feet planted.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Press straight up, avoid arching lower back.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.notes: Set bench to 30-45 degrees for upper chest.

exercises.name: Cable Triceps Pushdown
exercises.notes: Keep elbows pinned to sides, full extension at bottom.

exercises.name: Machine Chest Fly
exercises.notes: Squeeze chest at peak contraction.

exercises.name: Barbell Deadlift
exercises.notes: Complex movement. Keep back neutral, drive through heels.

exercises.name: Pull-ups (Assisted if needed)
exercises.notes: Full range of motion, chin over bar.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Row
exercises.notes: Pull elbow back, squeeze lat at top.

exercises.name: Cable Face Pull
exercises.notes: Pull towards face, targets rear delts.

exercises.name: Barbell Bicep Curl
exercises.notes: Keep elbows stationary, control the weight.

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.notes: Complex movement. Maintain upright torso, depth to parallel.

exercises.name: Leg Press Machine
exercises.notes: Feet shoulder-width, drive through heels.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (Barbell)
exercises.notes: Hinge at hips, feel stretch in hamstrings.

exercises.name: Leg Curl Machine
exercises.notes: Control the movement, squeeze hamstrings.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise Machine
exercises.notes: Full stretch at bottom, rise onto toes.

exercises.name: Barbell Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Complex movement. Press from shoulders, core tight.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Incline Fly
exercises.notes: Slight bend in elbows, stretch at bottom.

exercises.name: Machine Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Controlled tempo, full range of motion.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Raise to shoulder height, control descent.

exercises.name: Overhead Triceps Extension (Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Keep elbows close to head, full stretch.

exercises.name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
exercises.notes: Complex movement. Hinge at hips, pull to lower chest.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown Machine
exercises.notes: Pull to upper chest, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Cable Row (Seated)
exercises.notes: Keep back straight, pull to abdomen.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
exercises.notes: Neutral grip, control the movement.

exercises.name: Machine Reverse Fly
exercises.notes: Targets rear delts, squeeze at contraction.

exercises.name: Barbell Front Squat
exercises.notes: Complex movement. Keep elbows high, upright torso.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat (Dumbbells)
exercises.notes: Rear foot elevated, front knee tracks over toe.

exercises.name: Leg Extension Machine
exercises.notes: Squeeze quads at top, controlled lowering.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl Machine
exercises.notes: Curl heels to glutes, avoid lifting hips.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise Machine
exercises.notes: Full stretch at bottom, pause at top.

cardio.name: 15-Minute Cardio
cardio.description: Moderate intensity (Incline walk, steady cycle, or elliptical).

stretch.name: 10-Minute Full-Body Stretch
stretch.description: Focus on major muscle groups. Hold each stretch for 20-30 seconds.
